samples.description: Basic contact with name and email only

samples.text: Jane Doe is a Senior Software Engineer at Netflix. She graduated from MIT with a degree in Computer Science in 2015. Her email is jane.doe@example.com and phone is 650-555-1234. Jane lives in San Francisco and specializes in distributed systems and cloud architecture.
Robert Johnson graduated from Harvard Business School in 2018 with an MBA. He previously attended UCLA for his undergraduate degree in Economics. Robert can be reached at robert.j@example.com.
Elon Musk is the CEO of Tesla and SpaceX. He founded several companies including PayPal, Neuralink, and The Boring Company. Born in South Africa, he now lives in Texas.
Sarah works at Google in Mountain View

Michael Brown (mike.brown@example.com) is a Product Manager at Microsoft. He completed his Computer Science degree at Stanford University in 2010 and an MBA from Wharton in 2014. Michael has expertise in AI product development and previously worked at Google and Amazon. He lives in Seattle with his family and enjoys hiking in his free time. You can reach him at 206-555-7890.

samples.description: International profile with different date format
samples.text: Sophie Martin is a researcher at the University of Paris. She was born on 15/04/1988 and specializes in molecular biology. Her email is sophie.martin@univ-paris.fr and her phone number is +33 1 23 45 67 89.
